name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D CONCERT】Takanashi Kiara End Of The Year ⧸ Birthday Live 2023 小鳥遊キアラ生誕祭2023 #KFParty2023 [5LNv7CzFJgc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: MC section with Aki Rosenthal and Natsuiro Matsuri talking about their highlights of the year and future plans.
Performance of the song 'Zassou no Uta' (雑草のうた).

subtitles.original: Kikkeriki! Hello!
subtitles.english: Kikkeriki! Hello!

subtitles.original: Say hello to Aki-senpai!
subtitles.english: Say hello to Aki-senpai!

subtitles.original: アロナ！アキロゼんたーるです！
subtitles.english: Alona! I'm Aki Rosenthal!

subtitles.original: We danced Renai Circulation together.
subtitles.english: We danced Renai Circulation together.

subtitles.original: But before that, we danced with Matsuri-senpai, right?
subtitles.english: But before that, we danced with Matsuri-senpai, right?

subtitles.original: So let's get Matsuri-senpai!
subtitles.english: So let's get Matsuri-senpai!

subtitles.original: 元気に！お…ちょっと服が違うけどね。
subtitles.english: Energetically! Oh... the outfit is a bit different though.

subtitles.original: あ、そんなに小さくないけど…
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm not that small but...

subtitles.original: お姉さん組。
subtitles.english: The big sister group.

subtitles.original: あとうちの子ども？
subtitles.english: And our child?

subtitles.original: バブー！
subtitles.english: Babu!

subtitles.original: やめなさい。すぐママにされちゃうから。
subtitles.english: Stop it. You'll make me a mom immediately.

subtitles.original: I want to ask a question.
subtitles.english: I want to ask a question.

subtitles.original: 質問したい！
subtitles.english: I want to ask a question!

subtitles.original: お二人は今年一番嬉しかったこと…
subtitles.english: For you two, what was the thing you were most happy about...

subtitles.original: What was the thing you were most happy about this year?
subtitles.english: What was the thing you were most happy about this year?

subtitles.original: アキゼは、大好きなクレープ屋さんのコラボもいっぱいできたし…
subtitles.english: For me, I got to do many collaborations with my favorite crepe shop...

subtitles.original: 案件も来たこと！
subtitles.english: ...and getting projects!

subtitles.original: 待って、クレープうまいし、美味しい。
subtitles.english: Wait, crepes are good and delicious.

subtitles.original: 二人も来てくれたしね。
subtitles.english: You two also came, right?

subtitles.original: ね！美味しかった！またご馳走してください。
subtitles.english: Right! It was delicious! Please treat us again.

subtitles.original: もちろん近だよ。お腹すいた。いいよ、いつでも食べにおいで。
subtitles.english: Of course. I'm hungry. Sure, come eat anytime.

subtitles.original: まつりはやっぱり今年もリスナーさんと楽しいひと時を過ごせたことかにゃ。
subtitles.english: For me, it was being able to spend a fun time with the listeners this year too.

subtitles.original: Her favorite thing was just being with the viewers...
subtitles.english: Her favorite thing was just being with the viewers...

subtitles.original: ...and hers was, you know, being a crepe maker, which was really good, yeah.
subtitles.english: ...and hers was, you know, being a crepe maker, which was really good, yeah.

subtitles.original: 私はホロサマーのテーマ曲に参加したことと…
subtitles.english: For me, it was participating in the Hololive Summer theme song and...

subtitles.original: あと三年目にしてやっと3Dお披露目できたこと！っていう。
subtitles.english: ...finally having my 3D debut in my third year!

subtitles.original: It's almost 2024.
subtitles.english: It's almost 2024.

subtitles.original: もうすぐ2024年。
subtitles.english: It's almost 2024.

subtitles.original: 来年、私とやりたいこと！
subtitles.english: Next year, things you want to do with me!

subtitles.original: What do you want to do with me next year?
subtitles.english: What do you want to do with me next year?

subtitles.original: せっかく三人今いますから、ま、アキゼの家に行ってご飯食べたい。
subtitles.english: Since the three of us are here, I want to go to Aki-ze's house and eat.

subtitles.original: それこそね、ほらダンスできるから、ダンスもね、一緒にやりたい。
subtitles.english: Exactly, we can dance, so I want to dance together too.

subtitles.original: ゲームもしたい。と英語も教えてほしい。
subtitles.english: I want to play games too. And I want you to teach me English.

subtitles.original: 二人に英語教えられる英語メンバーはいっぱいいますから…
subtitles.english: There are many English members who can teach you two English...

subtitles.original: 私はドイツ語教えてあげる！
subtitles.english: ...so I'll teach you German!

subtitles.original: Guten Morgenってドイツ語？
subtitles.english: Is 'Guten Morgen' German?

subtitles.original: そうそうそう！おはようございます。
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, yes! It means good morning.

subtitles.original: So maybe we'll, you know, we'll get some cooking collabs next year...
subtitles.english: So maybe we'll, you know, we'll get some cooking collabs next year...

subtitles.original: ...maybe some dancing, and maybe I'll teach them German, who knows.
subtitles.english: ...maybe some dancing, and maybe I'll teach them German, who knows.

subtitles.original: But yeah, with that, let's move on to the next section!
subtitles.english: But yeah, with that, let's move on to the next section!

subtitles.original: ということで、次のアレに行きましょう。
subtitles.english: So, let's move on to the next section.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！バブー！バイバイ！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Babu! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: 始めようぜ
subtitles.english: Let's get started

subtitles.original: ぶちかませて
subtitles.english: Give it your all

subtitles.original: 夢見てるんじゃね
subtitles.english: Don't just dream

subtitles.original: 上がってこぜ
subtitles.english: Let's rise up

subtitles.original: 雑草みたいな俺たちの生き様を
subtitles.english: Our way of life, like weeds

subtitles.original:
雑草のうた
Lyrics: 岩里祐穂 Composition: 井上慎二郎
subtitles.english:
Weed's Song
Lyrics: Yuho Iwasato Composition: Shinjiro Inoue

subtitles.original: 笑いたい奴がいたら笑えばいい
subtitles.english: If there's someone who wants to laugh, let them laugh

subtitles.original: 同じことなんてしたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to do the same things

subtitles.original: 人と同じである意味信じない
subtitles.english: I don't believe in the meaning of being the same as others

subtitles.original: だって皆違うのに
subtitles.english: Because everyone is different

subtitles.original: 何度でも生まれてやるんだ
subtitles.english: I'll be reborn as many times as it takes

subtitles.original: 何度でも格好つけないままでいいじゃん
subtitles.english: It's fine to stay uncool as many times as it takes

subtitles.original: 未完成で死ぬまでカンカン
subtitles.english: Unfinished and blazing until death

subtitles.original: 誰でも土砂降り雨でも
subtitles.english: Anyone, even in a downpour

subtitles.original: 吹雪の夜でも
subtitles.english: Even on a blizzard night

subtitles.original: 倒れたって起き上がれる
subtitles.english: Even if I fall, I can get back up

subtitles.original: 踏まれて 踏まれて 踏まれて
subtitles.english: Being stepped on, stepped on, stepped on

subtitles.original: もっと強くなるんだ
subtitles.english: I will become even stronger

subtitles.original: Keep your head up
subtitles.english: Keep your head up

subtitles.original: 甘えてんじゃねぇ
subtitles.english: Don't be soft

subtitles.original: 始めようぜ
subtitles.english: Let's get started

subtitles.original: ぶちかませて
subtitles.english: Give it your all

subtitles.original: 夢見てるんじゃね
subtitles.english: Don't just dream
